ShortDescription.Value: Small collection of rural service assets

Publish.LongDescription:
## Dans Rural Service Pack My inspiration behind this pack was when I was making small towns around my city, I wanted small local options for services without having massive buildings in a small town, yeah the recycling center is pushing it (Opps).
Hope you Enjoy!
## Added Assets: * Rural Police Station (5 police cars, 3 jail cells, low maintenance costs) * Rural Medical Centre (2 ambulances, 10 hospital beds, low maintenance costs) * Rural Recycling Centre (2 Rubbish/Recycling Trucks, low maintenance costs) * Rural Post Office (4 Post vans, low maintenance costs) * Rural Welfare Office (Low maintenance costs)
# Credits: * Thank you to Konsi for all your help with assets. * Thank you to StarQ for assisting with the new asset format.
